companies.name: SenecaGlobal
companies.details: Joined as a Senior Software Engineer with the role of Independent Contributer. Getting my hands dirty with Design Patterns, SOLID Principles, Agile Practices, Microservices, etc.

companies.name: ValueCoders
companies.details: Worked as an integral part of the team at ValueCoders as a Full Stack Developer. Got my hands on Laravel, Vuejs, Elasticsearch, Symfony, etc. Gave a lot of training to the team members and associate developers.

companies.name: Sparx IT
companies.details: My Full Stack Development journey started here. Worked on Laravel, Node.js, Vuejs, JQuery and similar technologies here with a great team to build some of the very interesting products with a very collaborative and great management.

companies.name: HestaBit
companies.details: Started my career as a Backend Developer mainly in PHP and Laravel. Learned a lot and grew with HestaBit for 2 years. Found some great collegues there. Great management and people to work with.
